name: The odd gringo and The strange week at Kale Creek
name_original: The odd gringo and The strange week at Kale Creek
description:
In a world, where general shops only sell sodas and nobody has mail,
a strange lad was just minding his own business when suddenly,
something bad happened...

Now he is on a mission he didn't expect to survive, a mission for his life and freedom.
From the people who brought you such classics as Dreadback Blademania Antiborne Evolust and something else.
Based on a true story.

Important notes:

  • You can combine items by clicking on one item in the inventory. And dragging it to the other item.
  • You can use items on certain objects by clicking on the item in the inventory. And clicking on an object in the level.
  • Certain essential items are sometimes hard to find. Search everywhere ;)

Feel free to report any bugs or suggest changes or ideas, Thanks!
